name: Joryuu Janshi ni Chousen GB: Watashi-tachi ni Chousen Shitene!
overview: A full-scale 4-player mahjong game in which 6 young female mahjong players appear in live action. Choose from 6 rooms (modes) with the name of the sparrow and play. "Yoko's room" where you can freely set rules, "Kaori's room" with old socks mahjong rules, Dobon, one shot, second-kill mahjong with horses "Sayaka's room", hell mahjong "Ayumi" "Room of No", "Room of Chisato", a series of mahjong in the Dongfeng War, and "Room of Yuri", a super-inflated mahjong with a high score if there are cracks and yakitori. Since the data such as the sparrow style, striking line, and personality of each sparrow is taken in detail, you can fully enjoy the game with the female sparrow who has each individuality. Even beginners can easily enjoy playing against young female Ryujakushi.
